org.lightningj.paywall.requestpolicy

Class BaseRequestPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.requestpolicy.BaseRequestPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestPolicy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UrlAndMethod

    public abstract class BaseRequestPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestPolicy
    Base class with help methods to generate digest of the significant request data. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-10-27.

    • Method Detail

      • significantRequestDataDigest

        public RequestData significantRequestDataDigest(CachableHttpServletRequest request)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                java.io.IOException,
                                                InternalErrorException
        Method in charge of generating a digest of all significant data in a request that is needed to determine that the call is same that is invoiced
        Specified by:
        significantRequestDataDigest in interface RequestPolicy
        Parameters:
        request - the cachable http servlet request to aggregate request data for.
        Returns:
        a secure cryptographic digest of all significant request data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied request contained invalid data.
        java.io.IOException - if i/o related problems occurred reading the request data.
        InternalErrorException - if internal errors occurred reading the request data.

      • aggregateSignificantData

        protected abstract void aggregateSignificantData(CachableHttpServletRequest request,
                                                 java.io.DataOutputStream daos)
                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                 java.io.IOException,
                                                 InternalErrorException
        Method to write all significant data.
        Parameters:
        request - the cachable http servlet request to aggregate request data for.
        daos - data output stream to write data to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied request contained invalid data.
        java.io.IOException - if i/o related problems occurred reading the request data.
        InternalErrorException - if internal errors occurred reading the request data.
